#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int a,b,t,i,j,arr1[10],arr2[10],flag;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<10;j++)
            arr1[j]=arr2[j]=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        while(a>0)
        {
            arr1[a%10]++;
            a=a/10;
        }
        while(b>0)
        {
            arr2[b%10]++;
            b=b/10;
        }
        flag=1;
        for(j=0;j<10;j++)
        {
            if(arr1[j]!=arr2[j])
            {
                flag=0;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==0)
            cout<<"0\n";
        else
            cout<<"1\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
